title: VERA FILES FACT CHECK: Alejano to have Duterte arrested for drug war untrue
subtitle: A fabricated April 16 story on dailyviralhub.altervista.org claimed Magdalo Party-list Rep. Gary Alejano will have President Rodrigo Duterte arrested for the war on drugs.
author: verafiles.org
vclaim:
A fabricated April 16 story on dailyviralhub.altervista.org claimed Magdalo Party-list Rep. Gary Alejano will have President Rodrigo Duterte arrested for the war on drugs. 



The story used a video from YouTube page, President Rodrigo Duterte Updates, showing Alejano holding an April 13 press briefing at the House of Representatives. The opposition lawmaker offered recommendations on how the government should fight drugs but made no mention of arresting Duterte.

Three days before the story was posted, Duterte threatened to arrest International Criminal Court prosecutor Fatou Bensouda if she pushes through with the review of alleged extrajudicial killings in the country.

Alejano and Sen. Antonio Trillanes IV filed a supplemental communication to the ICC in June 2017 to conduct the investigation.

The biggest traffic generators of the story are Marcos Loyalist, Exclusive DDS Marcos the 3rd Force, and BongBong Marcos United, and could have reached more than 900,000 social media users.

Editor's Note: VERA Files has partnered with Facebook to fight the spread of disinformation.
